meanings.definition: The act of inspecting or reviewing weapons or military equipment.
meanings.sent1: During the wappenschawings, the soldiers checked their rifles for any defects.
meanings.sent2: The annual wappenschawings allowed the army to ensure all weapons were in top condition.
meanings.sent3: At the wappenschawings, the soldiers discovered a hidden compartment in one of the rifles, causing a moment of surprise.
